section.title: Reset a pinboard visualization
section.p: You can undo your edits to a pinboard visualization by resetting it.

section.title: Reset a pinboard visualization
section.p: After performing ad hoc actions or edits to a visualization of your pinboard, you can reset the visualization to its original form.

li.p: On an altered visualization, click the reset icon.
Save your pinboard by clicking the ellipses icon ![more options menu icon]({{ site.baseurl }}/images/icon-ellipses.png){: .inline} and selecting Save.
